relevant_findings.tender_subcutaneous_nodules: Multiple palpable nodules over posterior scalp, occiput, upper back along ribs, sacrum, and buttocks. Nodules were mobile, well circumscribed, and painful on palpation.

physical_examinations.changes_over_time: Nodularity decreased but pain persisted around biopsy sites. Subcutaneous nodules regressed during corticosteroid therapy but gradually reappeared over time.
Nodularity decreased but painful nodules continued to be present.

relevant_findings.subcutaneous_nodules: Mobile, well-circumscribed subcutaneous nodules present on multiple sites including lower back, buttocks, and thighs. A nodule was noted at the site of a previous biopsy.

physical_examinations.changes_over_time: Continuing pain in multiple areas with subtle and painful nodules on examination.
